text.title: Fort Walton Beach
text.head: Fort Walton Beach
text.p:
Fort Walton Beach
is a small city in
Emerald Coast
region of
Florida
, forty miles east of
Pensacola
.
text.head: By plane

list.item:
Destin – Fort Walton Beach Airport
( VPS ) . Serves Fort Walton Beach and nearby
Valparaiso
. American Eagle , Delta Air Lines , Delta Connection , United Express serve the airport .

text.head: By car
text.p:
US 98 connects Fort Walton Beach with
Pensacola
and
Panama City
. It also connects with nearby
Destin
. Florida 85 connects the area with I-10 .
text.head: Get around
text.p:
Fort Walton Beach has two main arterials . The
Miracle Strip Parkway
( US 98 ) travels along the seacoast and through Eglin Air Force Base , and the
Eglin Parkway
( Florida SR 85 ) links the city with Okaloosa Regional Airport .

text.head: Do

list.item: Visit the beach .

Billy Bowlegs Festival
, pirate themed street party early each June .

text.head: Buy

list.item: Antique stores and shops along Highway 98 / Miracle Strip Parkway across from the Indian Temple Mound .
